text:
Would be great to see an animation with those two!
Sorry for the format, was just through facebook but this is the feedback from my friend Matthew Brookes hes been a character designer for studios in the uk.

"Her design portfolio is good she’s doing everything right
The only thing I would suggest
Is to have more variety of styles
So she could take an existing show and do something in that style
Like do one in adventure time style one in fairly odd parents one like Steven universe
Add some props in there to maybe
Maybe include some more preschool stuff if she’s trying to get work in the uk ?
Hope it helps ya
Some good advice would be if there is a particular studio or show she wants to work for do something in the style of one of there shows to add to the folio"

If you have any more questions for him i can pass on his details :slightly_smiling_face:
Aw thank you so much! Really appreciate it!
I kept thinking there was stuff I needed to change my folio up but couldn't figure out what so this feedback is really helpful.
Ah great! actually Matt just asked if youd like him to recommend you to brown bag films for a remote character design job, He's moving to another job soon and needs to recommend people to replace him
If your interested shoot matt an email with your portfolio and CV :smile: <mailto:Matthewbrookeart@gmail.com|Matthewbrookeart@gmail.com>
